content.question: Which of the following best describes the result of running the procedure?

choices.label: The procedure returns when the user inputs the value and returns otherwise.
The procedure returns when the user inputs the value and returns otherwise.
The procedure returns no matter what the input value is.
The procedure returns no matter what the input value is.

content.answer: The procedure returns no matter what the input value is.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
